What is the current status of the Verus software, and what kind of risks should I be aware of when using it?

The Verus software is currently experimental and unfinished. As such, it should be used at your own risk, and no warranty is provided for any kind of damage that may occur. This means that you should be cautious when using the software, as it may not be fully tested or stable.
